name: Savage
description:
'''Savage''' are a British heavy metal band from [[Mansfield]], [[Nottinghamshire]], that formed in 1978. They were part of the [[new wave of British heavy metal]].

The band is most remembered for the song titled "Let it Loose", a track which made significant impact on the early 1980s metal scene (indeed, it was later covered by [[Metallica]] on [[List of Metallica demos#Whiskey Audition Tape|their Whiskey Audition Tape demo]]), and would later give rise to the name of their first album, ''Loose 'n Lethal'', released in 1983.
